data.text: Luzitisa Yave,
beno lunsalanga mu Nzo Yave,
Luzitisa Yave bila Yave widi wumboti ;
Bila Yave wukisobudila Yakobi mu ba wandi veka,
Nzebi ti Yave widi wunneni,
Muaki Yave weti vanga moso kazodidi,
Niandi wuntotulanga matuti mu zitsongi zi ntoto ;
Niandi wuvonda bana batheti mu Ezipite,
Wufidisa bidimbu biandi ayi matsiminanga
Niandi wuvonda makanda mawombo
Sihoni ntinu basi Amoli ;
Ayi wuvana zitsi ziawu banga kiuka ;
Dizina diaku, a Yave, dinzingilanga mu zithangu zioso,
Bila Yave wela nungisa batu bandi
Bitumba bi makanda bidi bi palata ayi bi nolo ;
bibeki miunu vayi bilendi tuba ko ;
Bibeki matu vayi bilendi wa ko
Batu bobo beti vanga biawu bela ba banga biawu
A nzo yi Iseli, luzitisa Yave.
A nzo yi Levi, luzitisa Yave.
Bika nzitusu wuba kuidi Yave tona mu Sioni
